extendedInfo.description: If you get bored and do not know what interesting to do, the application What Me To Do will help with this, and tells a really interesting tasks. Great ideas are accompanied by inspiring images. Become a spontaneous, fun and interesting person.Tips:I do not recommend clicking on the ânextâ-button  - it is meaningless. Just take and do something that offers What Me To Do. This is really interesting. You may move to the next task only if for some reason you cannot implement this idea now. Live in wonder, What Me To do tell me how to do it. For beautiful application need internet.If you know the interesting ideas for todo, please send - add them to the database, and your name / nickname to appear in the application. Post here: http://eikosol.com/whatmetodo/suggestAlso need some help with translation to English =)There's also a web version of the application http://eikosol.com/whatmetodo/

reviews.title: Yolo
reviews.comment: I don\'t like yolo. Nice though.
reviews.author: Maj Smerkol
